components/supermarket/common/fonts-coll:
<!-- Begin loading fonts -->
<script type="text/plain" id="themeFontsCollection">{{ getFontsCollection }}</script>
{{!--
<script>
(function() {
    var el = document.getElementById('themeFontsCollection');

    var txt = document.createElement('textarea');
    txt.innerHTML = el.innerHTML;

    var div = document.createElement('div');
    div.innerHTML = txt.value;

    for (var i = 0; i < div.childNodes.length; i++) {
        var node = div.childNodes[i];
        if (node.nodeType === 1) {
            if (node.tagName === 'LINK') {
                node.media = 'none';
                node.onload = function() {
                    node.media = 'all';
                    node.onload = null;
                }
            }
            el.parentNode.insertBefore(node, el);
        }
    }
})();
</script>
--}}
{{!-- Minify the script: --}}
<script>!function(){var e=document.getElementById("themeFontsCollection"),n=document.createElement("textarea");n.innerHTML=e.innerHTML;var t=document.createElement("div");t.innerHTML=n.value;for(var o=0;o<t.childNodes.length;o++){var a=t.childNodes[o];1===a.nodeType&&("LINK"===a.tagName&&(a.media="none",a.onload=function(){a.media="all",a.onload=null}),e.parentNode.insertBefore(a,e))}}();</script>
<noscript>{{ getFontsCollection }}</noscript>
<!-- End loading fonts -->
